detail_desc: Hair clips in metal and plastic with a matt finish. Length approx. 7 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Short, boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shorter top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.

Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. V-neck with open lacing at the front, short legs and a seam at the waist with a long, open skirt.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
One-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a shoulder strap on one side and a long sleeve on the other.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and wide shoulder straps.

Calf-length, long-sleeved dress in lace made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped yoke with a wide, flounced trim front and back that continues over the sleeves. Asymmetric skirt for added width at the hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Long mesh T-shirt with appliqués on the front, a rib-trimmed V-neck and dropped shoulders. Yoke and short sleeves in jersey.
Hi-top trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Tie in a jacquard weave. Width 6.5 cm.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Decorative gathers on the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, a seam at the hips and a seam with a flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow shoulder straps that have a concealed press-stud allowing the underdress to be removed.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim Fit.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed fastener at the top and ties at the side.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with side pockets, back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Zip fly and button, and slim, tapered legs.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Long, slightly wider sleeves with gathered cuffs.
Cigarette trousers in a viscose weave with a regular waist with that is elasticated at the back, side pockets and tapered legs with grosgrain side stripes.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with smocking, frills and ties at the cuffs.
Top in slub pima cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, tiered sleeves.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline,cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in cotton twill with press-studs down the front and short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems. Seam with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a tab and press-stud at the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and a back pocket with a press-stud. Legs with panels down the sides and elasticated hems. Mesh lining.
Sports trousers in stretch jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets with a concealed zip and a ventilating mesh section at the crotch.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Palazzo trousers in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist that has covered elastication at the back and creases at the front for added leg width. Concealed zip in one side and discreet side pockets. Tencel™ lyocell lining at the top.
Pool shoes with a padded foot strap, moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and short legs.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a high waist and buttons and a high slit at one side.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs that taper to the hem.
Blouse in airy patterned chiffon with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an asymmetric hem. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Straight-style top in cotton jersey with a boat neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Seam under the bust and at the waist and wide, straight, ankle-length legs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Knitted top in a relaxed fit with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders.

Pirate dress in stretch velour with a glittery motif on the front, a deep neckline and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Detachable elastic belt with a plastic buckle at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric skirt in satin and tulle. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with a text print and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and crossover straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of a cobweb with a spider in the centre. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.

Calf-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, welt front pockets and back pockets. Straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. UPF 50.
Short shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. High waist with elastication at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Joggers in washed, lightweight denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets and tapered legs.

PREMIUM QUALITY. Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with peak lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, patch pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Fully lined, one-shoulder bikini top with removable inserts. One shoulder strap with a decorative plastic ring, and no fasteners.
Faux fur gilet with a hood with sewn-on ears at the top and a zip with a chin guard at the front. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and half-length sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with a frill at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long dress in billowing organza with a double-layered stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Voluminous, elbow-length balloon sleeves in a double layer with a shorter inner layer that has concealed elastication to create added volume in the sleeves. Relaxed fit with a seam at the knees and a wide, flounced hem. Detachable, short underdress in a viscose weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted top in jersey with short sleeves.
